attributes.name: Ancient Struggle
attributes.description: "The conflict between corruption and azoth has lasted for centuries. Surely the bloodshed shall continue for centuries to come."
attributes.parsed_description: "The conflict between corruption and azoth has lasted for centuries. Surely the bloodshed shall continue for centuries to come."

attributes.name: Ancient Tactics
attributes.description: "Slashing at a hamstring is far more effective than slashing at an arm. If your enemy cannot move, they cannot fight."
attributes.parsed_description: "Slashing at a hamstring is far more effective than slashing at an arm. If your enemy cannot move, they cannot fight."

attributes.name: Ancient Tales
attributes.description: "It's a tale as old as time. Two people fight and only one walks away alive."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's a tale as old as time. Two people fight and only one walks away alive."

attributes.name: Ancient Tidings
attributes.description: "Welcome to Aeternum, where your demise is just around the corner!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Welcome to Aeternum, where your demise is just around the corner!"

attributes.name: Ancient Warhammer
attributes.description: An ancient hammer whose power surpasses time.

attributes.name: Ancient Yardstick
attributes.description: "Measurements were essential to the experiments of the Ancients."
attributes.parsed_description: "Measurements were essential to the experiments of the Ancients."

attributes.name: Anesthetic
attributes.description: "Just a quick tap on your skull and you'll be out cold."
attributes.parsed_description: "Just a quick tap on your skull and you'll be out cold."

attributes.name: Angel's Wings
attributes.description: "I pray that they shall guide my arrow."
attributes.parsed_description: "I pray that they shall guide my arrow."

attributes.name: Angry Earth Exterminator
attributes.description: "Killing Dryads is oh so fun. And now with this spear you can do it faster than ever!"
attributes.parsed_description: "Killing Dryads is oh so fun. And now with this spear you can do it faster than ever!"

attributes.name: Antique Battleaxe
attributes.description: "This axe has to be hundreds of years old, but it still has its edge."
attributes.parsed_description: "This axe has to be hundreds of years old, but it still has its edge."

attributes.name: Aphedia
attributes.description: “Sound of mind. Resolute in purpose. Reborn of Azoth.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Sound of mind. Resolute in purpose. Reborn of Azoth.”

attributes.name: Appointed Negotiator
attributes.description: "Karl never gave orders without having his Appointed Negotiator around. It never failed to stop arguments before they started."
attributes.parsed_description: "Karl never gave orders without having his Appointed Negotiator around. It never failed to stop arguments before they started."

attributes.name: Arbirator's Wisdom
attributes.description: "The difference between life and death is but a swing."
attributes.parsed_description: "The difference between life and death is but a swing."

attributes.name: Arcane Cracker
attributes.description: “Knowledge has no bounds, why should you?”
attributes.parsed_description: “Knowledge has no bounds, why should you?”

attributes.name: Arcane Fire
attributes.description: "Master magicians all start somewhere. The poor soul who lost this is probably still being scolded."
attributes.parsed_description: "Master magicians all start somewhere. The poor soul who lost this is probably still being scolded."

attributes.name: Arcane Infused Life Staff
attributes.description: "Arcane magic is... unusual for these sorts of spells, but I suppose it can work."
attributes.parsed_description: "Arcane magic is... unusual for these sorts of spells, but I suppose it can work."

attributes.name: Arcane Light
attributes.description: "A purple light radiates from the staff, giving you a warm feeling as you wield it."
attributes.parsed_description: "A purple light radiates from the staff, giving you a warm feeling as you wield it."

attributes.name: Arcane Reaper
attributes.description: "Hunting mages has never been more fun."
attributes.parsed_description: "Hunting mages has never been more fun."

attributes.name: Arcane Sight
attributes.description: "The watchful eye of the Guardians sees beyond time."
attributes.parsed_description: "The watchful eye of the Guardians sees beyond time."

attributes.name: Arcane Warhammer
attributes.description: "A hammer of pure magical energy, the weapon weighs nothing yet hits with the force of an avalanche."
attributes.parsed_description: "A hammer of pure magical energy, the weapon weighs nothing yet hits with the force of an avalanche."

attributes.name: Archaelogist's Defender
attributes.description: "Aeternum is an archaeologist's paradise with ruins galore to explore."
attributes.parsed_description: "Aeternum is an archaeologist's paradise with ruins galore to explore."

attributes.name: Archaeologist's Armored Flintlock
attributes.description: "Opening crusty old tombs leads to ancient creations finding new life."
attributes.parsed_description: "Opening crusty old tombs leads to ancient creations finding new life."

attributes.name: Archaic Rapier
attributes.description: A reward from Antiquarian Pajitnova for recovering the Antiquarian's Eyepiece.
attributes.parsed_description: A reward from Antiquarian Pajitnova for recovering the Antiquarian's Eyepiece.

attributes.name: Archeologean's Lantern
attributes.description: "To illuminate the past, you need a lantern with the power to shine through the ages."
attributes.parsed_description: "To illuminate the past, you need a lantern with the power to shine through the ages."

attributes.name: Archmage Fultis's Life Staff
attributes.description: "The initials 'A.B.F.' are carved into the staff."
attributes.parsed_description: "The initials 'A.B.F.' are carved into the staff."

attributes.name: Archmage's Assistant
attributes.description: "The mages historically have favored staves and enchanted gauntlets. But some problems require a bit more force."
attributes.parsed_description: "The mages historically have favored staves and enchanted gauntlets. But some problems require a bit more force."
